channel.title: Lgbtq on Five Minutes Reads
channel.description: Recent content in Lgbtq on Five Minutes Reads

item.title: Pilgrimage helped Traitors star Amanda say 'goodbye mum'
item.description: Pilgrimage helped Traitors star Amanda say ‘goodbye mum’ Amanda, 56, was catapulted to public attention in the BBC’s first series of The Traitors - where she donned her hooded cloak. She is one of seven well known personalities, of differing faiths and beliefs, to tackle a modern-day pilgrimage for a new BBC Two series. Amanda’s childhood was unconventional, particularly her relationship with her mother. As a practising Catholic, she initially wanted to question her faith.
